comments: May be interpreted differently on some blocks

long_description: Radio buttons with a textbox for the last entry
Checkboxes with a textbox associated to the last entry (last checkbox).  Usually, the textbox is only shown if the last checkbox is selected.
Checkboxes with a conditional question with textbox in the 2nd answer option
comments: So far, only used for water source question

long_description: Drop-down list box for mutually exclusive answers
SRE.UID does not require any direct answer.
Matrix of radio buttons with a drop-down box in the last column
Matrix of radio buttons with the last row having a textbox
Radio buttons in a matrix where the last column is a drop-down box

comments: For now, only possible when the parent of this element has ANCA.ID=12

long_description: Value calculated or copied from subsequent questions/elements
comments: Example:  The expected answer for the height is the height in inches (float) calculated from the values written in the Ft and In textboxes

long_description: Similar to radio buttons, but used to select mutually exclusive answers and immediately go to the next page without having to click on any next button.
comments: E.g.:  This answer category applies to the three buttons the respondent use to select their type (parent of minor proband, legally authorized representative of adult proband,or self-reporting adult proband).  It also applies to the Add Address buttons.
